projectGridLines.title: Explore Tata EV truck with higher capacity to reduce no of trips and to use green energy. We require candidate from Jamshedpur to save cost on accommodation arrangement and better coordination with Mentor.
projectGridLines.description:
Explore Tata EV truck with higher capacity to reduce no of trips and to use green energy. We require candidate from Jamshedpur to save cost on accommodation arrangement and better coordination with Mentor.

Required metallurgical engineering intern, to work on a project " strap heat treatment process and different opportunities"

Comprehensive study on the Data with Analysis on Competitors and Customers - Auto Segment

Detail Analysis on the Automation used for packaging for Auto Segment and Detail analysis on the RTP Business potential and opportunity in Auto Segment

Developing ecosystem to recycle/re-use of the packaging material.

Study the present operations and process mapping for productivity/safety improvement.
